EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Chicago - PAIR - Post Event Email - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: Start Your Advanced Analytics Journey with Pivotal!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for joining us at the Pivotal Analytics and Innovation Roadshow (PAIR). We hope you came away with a clearer understanding of how analytics and data science can deliver better outcomes for your stakeholders.
We’d be happy to speak with you about how to be successful with your own analytics initiatives. In the meantime, here are some resources to start you on your journey:
PAIR Presentations and other materials <[[https://content.pivotal.io/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]>
PAIR Workshop: Demos, code, and other technical resources:
- Airline Optimization Code <[[https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B76GEdSVCa8NUGVmM0VUeERRV0U?usp=sharing]]>
- Stock Prediction from 8-K Reports: Code <[[https://github.com/crawles/market-nlp]]> / App <[[http://marketnlp.cfapps.pez.pivotal.io/]]> - Twitter Sentiment Analysis: Code <[[https://github.com/crawles/twitter-nlp]]> / App <[[http://twitternlp.cfapps.pez.pivotal.io/]]> - Text Analytics on Greenplum Examples <[[https://github.com/scottcode/text_analytics_on_mpp]]> - MADlib documentation <[[http://madlib.incubator.apache.org/docs/latest/index.html]]> - Pivotal & R Guide <[[http://pivotalsoftware.github.io/gp-r/]]>
Also, take advantage of additional online resources for Data Science <[[https://content.pivotal.io/data-science?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]> and Pivotal Greenplum <[[https://pivotal.io/pivotal-greenplum?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-pair-2017]]>.
Now is the time to take the reins of your digital transformation. Let’s build something meaningful!
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
